Title: RMS: User Registration
Body:
Registration Process

The registration process consists of 3 steps:

  1. Filling and submitting the registration form
  2. Email address verification
  3. Approval of the account

Registration Form

Click "Registration" in the upper right corner:

Alternatively, open {{c:default,f:user,noargs}}/register in your web browser.

Fill in the registration form:

  • Make sure that you typed in your email address correctly!
  • RMS will send all registration emails to this address.
  • You will need this email address to login to RMS

Finally, click the "Register" button to submit the form.

Email Address Verification

RMS will automatically send a message to the email address you entered:

Click on the link in the email to verify your email address. Alternatively, you can copy the web address into the address line of your web browser in order to open it.

You should see a confirmation screen like this:

If you don't see a confirmation message, then you may have opened the link in the verification email before. Opening it a second time has no effect.

Account Approval

RMS will automatically inform an administrator about your registration, and request approval of your account.

When your account has been approved, you will receive another email from RMS informing you that you can now login at the site.

Use the links in the email to navigate to RMS.

  • Learn how to maintain your user profile and personal information
